short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Explore new piece of art today.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hallery - Discover Art on Your New Tab

Embrace the art world with every new tab and let creativity inspire you throughout your browsing journey. Experience the joy of discovering art in the most seamless and straightforward way possible.

Transform your new tab page into a canvas of creativity with Hallery - an open-source extension that brings the beauty of art to your browsing experience. Hallery curates a captivating collection of artworks from talented artists worldwide, surprising you with a new masterpiece every time you open a new tab.
